text: is vajah se ki un logon ne mujhe jhuthala diya to hamane nooh ke paas vahee bhejee ki tum hamaare saamane hamaare hukm ke mutaabiq kashtee banaana shuru karo phir jab kal hamaara azaab aa jae aur tannoor (se paanee) ubalane lage to tum usamen har kism (ke jaanavaron mein) se (nar maada) do do ka joda aur apane ladake baalon ko bitha lo magar un mein se jisakee nisbat (garaq hone ka) pahale se hamaara hukm ho chuka hai (unhen chhod do) aur jin logon ne (hamaare hukam se) sarakashee kee hai unake baare mein mujhase kuchh kahana (sunana) nahin kyonki ye log yakeenan doobane vaale hai
